;It is not uncommon for someone to break up when they are in a relationship. The question is, should I agree? My opinion is that when one party proposes a breakup, whether it is a real breakup or a breakup to coerce the other party into accepting their conditions, the other party should agree. 36Kr’s “2022 Chinese Couples Breakup Report” shows that more than 60% of girls break up first. We will use the woman to break up for analysis, but the opposite is true, and it also applies to the man to break up.

;

;Some young netizens discovered an interesting phenomenon around them: when girls propose breaking up, boys basically agree. TA further said that because some girls like to use breakup as a means, but boys generally use breakup as the result.

;

;We will discuss it on a case-by-case basis.

;

;In the first situation, a girl is serious about breaking up, but in the general perception of boys, breaking up is equivalent to announcing a breakup. You have informed me, so what if you don’t accept it?

;

;Besides, if you really want to break up, wouldn’t it be nice if the other party behaves decently and doesn’t keep pestering you? If one party wants to break up and the other party refuses to let go, it may lead to tragedy, which is what many people in love fear.

;

;I agree with the sentiment that "breakups are serious." Breaking up is equivalent to the death of love. A person who cherishes life should naturally cherish feelings. He should not talk about "breaking up" unless it is no longer possible and must be said. In other words, if you don't say "break up", don't leave any room for it - when you say "break up", it means "sealing the throat with a sword" to the old relationship.

;

;In the second situation, the girl’s proposal to break up is false and the purpose is to make her boyfriend submit. On Himalaya, some netizens complained: My girlfriend often threatens to break up with me in order to get me to give her gifts. What kind of mentality is this? A group of netizens commented: This kind of girlfriend just wants something from you. If you are not in too deep, it is better to leave decisively.

;

;In reality, it is often the case that girls who break up with them use the breakup as a game to force boys to compromise and satisfy their own needs. In this case, boys' indiscriminate pleading is "cooperating" with the game's tactics, and it is also a meaningless sacrifice of self-rights and due stance. This can lead to various passive situations. From the perspective of human nature, if a girl unreasonably breaks up with her, she will get very good results - for example, her boyfriend will obey her words and not dare to violate them at all. For example, her boyfriend will buy things to compensate her to make her happy. Then it will be difficult for this girl not to gain a sense of accomplishment and deliberately make it a kind of inertia, making the other person keep flapping according to the owner's wishes like a bird locked in a cage.

;

;As long as a person is not a masochist, it is unlikely that he can endure all kinds of teasing and belittling by the other party without breaking down. To fully accept unfair demands is to dig a hole for yourself. It’s so easy to give in and compromise when you’re in love. After getting married, if the other party files for divorce if they don’t get along, what should you do? Someone has said it well: "Breakups are mentioned frequently now, and divorce will definitely be mentioned frequently in the future." If this is the case, should we continue to compromise? If this is the case, how much happiness and trust can there be in a marriage? I'm afraid it has long been overdrawn by one party's willfulness, tyranny and one party's weakness.

;

;It can be seen that whether it is a true score or a false score, directly agreeing is the best choice. When a person is in front of someone who doesn't love him, or in front of someone who is always trying to "test" himself, there is no other way for him to do anything but be tough.

;

;Of course, people’s hearts are made of flesh, and after being together for a long time, it is indeed difficult to make a break. Human nature is always complicated. Being "kicked" by the other party when you still love the other party deeply is indeed shocking and painful. Therefore, some people who have been broken up with want to stay out of nostalgia for the past relationship. This is not It's strange, but facts show that long-term pain is worse than short-term pain. It is wise to leave the person who "mispaid" the relationship as soon as possible. No matter how difficult the decision is, no matter how painful the heart is, it is better than letting yourself fall into an emotional quagmire and be unable to get out.

;

;You must know that hesitating and insisting on breaking up will not only make you and the other party extremely tired, but you are also more likely to be laughed at and affect your work and life because you cry and feel depressed all day long. future. After all, stalking itself means losing self-esteem and "lowering to the dust". In addition, being indecisive and being weak can also bring about bad situations and even negative consequences. In life, some couples "will get together if they are separated for a long time, and they will break up if they are together for a long time." After wasting their great youth, they eventually ended up breaking up, which is equivalent to a wasted effort.

;

;In my hometown, some rural couples have been quarreling all their lives. Often one party wants to leave and the other refuses. As a result, the two people cannot reconcile until they grow old, which also affects the lives of their children. If they break up early, they can Is there such a thing?

;

;Comparing these results, resolutely agreeing to break up will not only save a lot of unnecessary troubles, but also "let go" both parties. Isn't this the best result?

;

;What's more, the firm consent of the person being broken up is also a lesson to the other party. A psychology expert told a story that one of her friends was broken up in love and was in a very low mood. He thought she had been dumped, but when he asked, he found out that she was the one who initiated the breakup. The point is, she didn't want to break up, she just threatened her boyfriend again, but this time her boyfriend didn't keep her.

;

;"Breaking up reveals one's character." As the saying goes, don’t do to others what you don’t want others to do to you. It’s not easy for two people who truly love each other to come together. They should manage their relationship well and jointly resist various risks encountered in the journey of life. How can you create risks and disturbances by yourself and let yourself fall into trouble? ?

;

;It is worth noting that some people like to talk about breaking up casually and use breakup to control others. This is not only disrespectful to the other party, but also completing a kind of discipline. Some people just enjoy the sense of accomplishment of "taming the other person under their feet and treating them like a dog."

;

;Since the discipline does not set a time limit, this situation should make people vigilant. Resisting discipline is the responsibility of every person in the "Emotional Castle". Getting together and staying together easily is the simplest and most practical love rule. Life is not long, and we can be prepared to spend this life with someone, or we can be prepared to let go when the opportunity arises. This is what we should do in order to avoid being troubled and constrained by a marriage that lacks quality.

;On November 17, two pilot whales more than 4 meters long and weighing about 800 kilograms arrived from Hangzhou Departing from a polar ocean park, "relocated" to an ocean park in Zhoushan more than 200 kilometers away, and moved into a more spacious "new home". With a head weighing 800 kilograms, it is quite a battle to "move" such a big man over a long distance. It not only requires cranes and large trucks, but also requires more than 20 adults to carry it. So the question is, how many steps does it take to "move" a pilot whale? What is the greatest difficulty? What preparations have the staff made to protect the pilot whales?

;

;What are the steps to “move” a pilot whale?

;

;It is not an easy task to "move" a pilot whale weighing about 800 kilograms, and to move both animals together. So, what are the steps to "move" a pilot whale?

;

;The staff said that there are five steps to "moving" the pilot whale this time. The first step: Capture and transportation, after capturing the pilot whale from the breeding tank, transport it to the box; The second step: Putting into the box and hoisting; The third step: Inspection before transportation, including the pilot whale’s breathing frequency, Check the mental state, etc.; Step 4: Monitoring during transportation, including monitoring of water temperature, air temperature, mental state, activity state, respiratory rate, etc. of animals during transportation; Step 5: After arriving at the destination, hoist into the water .

;

;What are the living habits of pilot whales? Why did it get its name?

;

;To successfully "move" a big guy like a pilot whale, you need to understand its physiological characteristics and living habits. Next, let’s get to know the large marine creature-pilot whale.

;

;Pilot whales are mammals in the family Cetacea, Delphinidae, and are also called "pilot whales" because of their huge size. Pilot whales are divided into two types: long-limbed pilot whales and short-limbed pilot whales. Long-limbed pilot whales are mainly distributed in high-latitude waters, while short-limbed pilot whales are distributed in tropical and temperate waters.

;

;;;

;;Sun Dong, associate researcher at the Second Institute of Oceanography of the Ministry of Natural Resources:;Pilot whales generally like to gather in large groups in the natural marine environment. The size of this group can usually reach 200 to 300. , this is a very large scale, which is rare among whales. Pilot whales are the liveliest among cetaceans. Pilot whales are often seen by sailors willing to accompany sailboats or ships when the ship is sailing on the sea. Their playful behavior.

;

;In recent years, due to the destruction of the marine environment, the number of pilot whales has been declining, and they have been included in the second level of my country's "List of National Key Protected Wild Animals".

;

;What are the difficulties for the "big" pilot whale to "move"?

;

;In addition to their large size and heavy weight, what are the difficulties in "moving" pilot whales? Come on and listen to the expert’s introduction.

;

;;Sun Dong, associate researcher at the Second Institute of Oceanography of the Ministry of Natural Resources:;From the most professional perspective, the most important thing about the "movement" of whales is that we call this whale Cetaceans need to use their lungs to breathe, so the vent on its back, or in layman's terms, its nostrils must be exposed above the water to prevent it from drowning. Cetaceans can drown. But the water cannot be put in very little. If it is put in very little, one will cause its skin to become dry and dehydrated. Dehydration is a very serious event for cetaceans. The second is the huge body of cetaceans. , it needs the buoyancy of water to support its weight. Another factor is temperature. For cetaceans, especially when the temperature rises, it will cause them to suffer from overheating shock. This should be strictly avoided.

;

;Why do pilot whales need to apply Vaseline when they “go out”?

;

;When it comes to "moving" a "big guy" like a pilot whale, every detail is important. There is such a detail in the transfer process that the reporter just photographed. After the pilot whale came out of the water, the staff smeared Vaseline on the pilot whale. Why did they do this?

;

;;Liu Quansheng, technical director of a polar marine park in Hangzhou:;The pilot whales apply Vaseline to prevent dehydration, because when the temperature is too high, cetaceans can easily dehydrate. After covering it with Vaseline, it will prevent moisture from dispersing. After applying Vaseline, we will cover it with a layer of wet towel. In this way, it has a water-retaining effect, that is, one is to prevent dehydration and the other is to moisturize.

;

;Experts told reporters that this time the two pilot whales "moved", they were smeared with medical Vaseline which had almost no harm to their skin. The main area of ​​application was the back skin exposed to the air, but Avoid air vents when applying. Two pilot whales arrived at their "new home" in Zhoushan. Before entering the water, the staff used a towel to wipe off the Vaseline on the pilot whales.

;

;How to reduce the stress response of pilot whales during transportation?

;

;From Hangzhou to Zhoushan, it spans more than 200 kilometers. To ensure the safety of the animals, the vehicle must maintain a stable speed of 90 kilometers per hour during transportation. This extended the original drive of more than 2 hours to 5 hours. How can pilot whales reduce their stress response during long-distance transfers and reach their "new home" safely?

;

;;Liu Quansheng, technical director of a polar marine park in Hangzhou:;We will stop eating 24 hours before transportation, and gradually reduce the amount of food in the first three days. This is the first ; Second, we will ensure appropriate water and air temperatures during transportation. This time we set the water temperature for the pilot whale at 23.5°C, which is a water temperature that is more suitable for raising it; third, we We need to ensure that the air in this transport vehicle circulates, that it cannot be too hot or too windy, and that it must be enclosed. Fourthly, we will have accompanying veterinarians and keepers who have raised it for a long time, who will caress and carry it out. An exchange.

;

;In order to allow the pilot whales to adapt to the new environment as quickly as possible, the room temperature, water temperature, lighting and other aspects of Zhoushan's "new home" are set according to the natural environment in which they live. However, in the first two days after arrival, the staff will feed a small amount of food, and then resume a normal diet after the pilot whales slowly adapt.

;;2023-11-19 15:00:00;
;

;A spokesman for the Ministry of Commerce recently stated at a regular press conference that the Ministry of Commerce has recently organized a special cleanup to further investigate Regulations and measures that may exist that discriminate against foreign-funded enterprises will create a fairer market competition environment for foreign-funded enterprises.

;

;According to the website of the Ministry of Commerce, the Department of Foreign Investment of the Ministry of Commerce issued a document on November 8, requiring a special cleanup of regulations and measures containing unreasonable differential treatment of domestic and foreign capital. The scope of the cleanup includes laws, regulations, normative documents, and other policy measures issued by local governments and departments, as well as various measures related to business entities formulated by relevant departments. The document also lists a number of specific cleanup matters, including restrictions on foreign investment in access areas, discriminating or excluding foreign-invested enterprises and their products and services on the grounds of foreign brands, excluding or restricting foreign-invested enterprises from participating in government procurement, etc.

;

;The Ministry of Commerce’s special clean-up operation is targeted. In recent years, with the improvement of China's economic strength and external trade frictions such as "decoupling and breaking links", there has been a domestic argument that "it is strong enough and no longer needs foreign investment." There are also more and more comments on social media that are hostile to foreign brand products, and there are even restrictions on foreign brand products in some places. Some time ago, Hunan Yueyang Sanhe Airport banned Tesla electric vehicles from entering the airport on the grounds of "confidential control." After attracting great attention, Yueyang Airport lifted this restriction, but similar phenomena still exist in many local departments. In addition to Tesla, Apple's mobile phones and other electronic products also receive special "care".

;

;This kind of restriction on foreign brands has no legal basis. In September 2023, Foreign Ministry spokesperson Mao Ning stated at a press conference that China has not issued laws, regulations or policy documents prohibiting the purchase and use of foreign brand mobile phones such as Apple. The reason why some departments and companies ban Tesla cars, Apple mobile phones, etc. is that their cameras, microphones and other sensors may obtain surrounding environment information and upload it abroad, which involves "state secrets" and "personal information security". However, according to Tesla's statement, the video captured by its car's "Sentinel Mode" is only stored in the vehicle's local storage device and will not be uploaded to the Internet. Other vehicle data will only be uploaded to the company's data center in China. The iCloud service used by Apple's domestic users is also operated by the domestic big data company "Cloud Guizhou".

;

;Although Tesla and Apple are foreign brands, their products sold domestically are basically produced in factories in China. Their super factory in Shanghai has more than 10,000 employees. In addition, the localization rate of Tesla's auto parts has exceeded 95%, which has stimulated the development of many domestic companies in the upstream industrial chain, not only bringing income to the employees of these companies, but also improving the production level of the companies. The improvement of the production capacity of these enterprises has also provided energy for the development of other domestic automobile manufacturers. The same is true for Apple. Not only does its domestic foundries directly provide jobs for hundreds of thousands of people, but it also greatly improves the capabilities of the domestic industrial chain through strict management of domestic suppliers.

;

;Introducing foreign capital is not just about hundreds of millions or even billions of money, but more importantly, entrepreneurial spirit and talent, which is to discover or even "create" market opportunities and seize them. , the ability to create social wealth. During the process of reform and opening up, the introduction of foreign investment has played a huge role in promoting China's economic development. This impetus does not only come from money itself. China's goal of introducing foreign investment is not only to solve the problem of insufficient domestic development funds, but more importantly, to "learn advanced Western technology and management experience."

;

;In fact, it may be the competition, management and other concepts that come with foreign investment that play a greater role in promoting China's development. It is precisely because of the pressure of foreign capital that China's market-oriented reform has been accelerated, and domestic enterprises have also strengthened their bodies and developed in the competition with foreign capital. Even though China has now become the world's second largest economy, it still needs to introduce foreign investment. Because in many areas, China still needs foreign technology and entrepreneurial talents.

;

;In August 2023, the State Council issued the "24 Policies and Measures for Attracting Foreign Investment," emphasizing the need to create a "market-oriented, legal, and international first-class business environment." A market-oriented and legalized business environment requires that foreign-invested enterprises be treated equally and receive national treatment. As long as they are not within the scope of the negative list stipulated by the state, there cannot be any discrimination or restrictions on foreign investment. The products and services provided by domestic foreign-funded enterprises should also be treated equally with those of other domestic enterprises. Just like although the "Government Procurement Law" stipulates that under normal circumstances government procurement "should purchase domestic goods, projects and services," the Ministry of Finance issued a special document in 2021 requiring that except for procurement projects involving national security and state secrets, government procurement must not distinguish Treat products produced in China by domestic and foreign-funded enterprises. As long as it is produced within China, regardless of whether its suppliers are domestic or foreign, their equal participation in government procurement should be guaranteed. This special clean-up operation by the Ministry of Commerce also includes the issue of restricting foreign-invested enterprises from participating in local bidding and government procurement as a clean-up matter.

;

;After the Ministry of Commerce’s cleanup operation began, social media information showed that some local agencies’ “No Tesla Entry” signs had been removed. Prohibiting discrimination against foreign-owned enterprises is a good start.

;

;The global obesity and overweight problems have become increasingly apparent in recent decades. According to data from the World Health Organization, in 2016 Nearly 40% of adults worldwide are overweight, of which 13% are obese. There are approximately 2 billion overweight people. This increase continues despite public health measures to prevent and slow obesity in many countries. Along with the obesity epidemic comes a large disease burden. How to better manage weight has become an urgent problem in the field of health sciences.

;

;;Balancing the quality and quantity of carbohydrates;

;

;Carbohydrates, as a major source of dietary energy for people, have long been the focus of weight loss. Coping strategies such as the "ketogenic diet" of eating less or no staple food, or even strictly limiting carbohydrate intake have been derived. The "ketogenic diet" cuts off carbohydrates as an energy source and attempts to promote weight loss by burning fat to provide energy. Although this method has some short-term experimental support, what will happen if it is persisted in the long term is still a mystery.

;

;Moreover, the "ketogenic diet" requires maintaining a high level of fat intake while maximizing carbohydrate intake, which may increase the risk related to cardiovascular disease. In addition, it will also put pressure on the liver, kidneys and maintenance of nutritional balance, and there is a risk of a series of adverse reactions such as cognitive decline, constipation, fatigue, and nausea. Therefore, long-term adherence to such a diet for weight loss remains controversial.

;

;However, compared with the controversial "ketogenic diet" that strictly limits carbohydrate intake, a diet that reasonably controls carbohydrates has actually been widely recognized, including paying more attention to nutritional balance and simplicity. Processed “Mediterranean Diet” etc. Recently, scientists from Harvard School of Public Health and other institutions also found through long-term observational studies that instead of focusing generally on the total amount of carbohydrate intake, it is better to pay more attention to the quality and source of carbohydrates, so as to achieve better long-term weight management.

;

;Because their research data shows that some carbohydrate-containing foods do make you fatter as you eat them, but there are also some carbohydrate-rich foods that may actually have a weight loss effect if you eat too much of them. Overall, higher glycemic index and glycemic load will lead to weight gain. Adding 100 grams of starch or added sugar per day increased weight gain by 1.5 kilograms and 0.9 kilograms respectively over four years. Relevant research was published in the British Medical Journal (BMJ) in September 2023. The main sources of daily starch are seeds and tubers such as wheat and rice, which are various staple foods.

;

;Starchy vegetables such as potatoes and peas, and refined grains are also associated with weight gain. A 100-gram daily intake increase will increase weight gain by 2.6 kilograms and 0.8 kilograms respectively. But if it is non-starchy vegetables and whole grains, the increase in intake will actually reduce weight gain and help control weight. Increasing the intake of non-starchy vegetables by 100 grams per day will reduce weight gain by 3 kilograms, and the intake of 100 grams of whole grains will reduce weight gain by 0.4 kilograms. Similarly, consuming carbohydrates through fruits can also help reduce weight gain, with a daily intake increase of 100 grams corresponding to 1.6 kilograms less weight gain.

;

;The reason why these data are limited to four years to assess weight change is because some health data in the study are updated on a four-year cycle. Using data from more than 130,000 people in projects such as the Nurses' Health Study, researchers analyzed the relationship between people's diet and weight changes over more than two decades and discovered these overall patterns of carbohydrates. Over the past two decades, people's average weight has increased by 8.8 kilograms, about 1.5 kilograms every four years.

;

;;Highly processed carbohydrates have become a target;

;

;If a person pays more attention to the management of carbohydrate quality and sources, use equal amounts of non-starchy vegetables, fruits and Substituting whole grains for foods like refined grains, starchy vegetables, and sugary drinks will result in less weight gain. In addition to foods such as vegetables and whole grains that are consumed in large amounts, an increase in dietary fiber intake also helps with weight management. Every 10 grams of increase per day corresponds to a reduction of 0.8 kilograms of weight gain. Considering that the age of the people in the study happens to span the middle-aged and elderly stages, including the critical period of weight gain in middle age, this large-sample long-term follow-up study has important reference significance for middle-aged people to strengthen weight management.

;

;Of course, although the latest research data has the advantages of large volume and long follow-up time, and can capture more changes in diet and health, there are still some limitations, such as carbohydrate intake and Information such as weight is reported by the respondents themselves. There may be certain errors in these data, which will affect relevant conclusions and interpretations. To better understand the long-term health effects of carbohydrates, more randomized, controlled, long-term studies are needed to further confirm the conclusions in the latest findings.

;

;As for why people become obese, the most popular explanation is energy imbalance, which is commonly known as "eating more and moving less", but this is not the exact answer to the common obesity phenomenon in humans. As obesity rates remain high, some scientists think the problem may not be that simple. Two common explanations currently take into account more complex body system factors. For example, one view is that on the basis that energy intake exceeds consumption, because modern people eat too much ultra-processed food with high energy density, there may also be endocrine, metabolic and nervous system effects, making it more difficult for people to eat food. Self-control.

;

;Another explanation related to insulin is that the hormonal response triggered by a large amount of ultra-processed carbohydrates causes the body to store more energy in fat, resulting in a lack of energy required for basic metabolism of the body. , after the brain recognizes this state, it will issue a hunger command, thus entering a vicious cycle of getting fatter and overeating. While the understanding of obesity remains controversial, these analyzes and a host of health studies have focused on carbohydrates in processed foods, including all types of so-called "junk food" that are high in sugar and fat.

;

;Ultra-processed carbohydrates are classified as "junk food", which is not unrelated to the current scientific community's understanding of the functions of carbohydrates. Carbohydrates are the only macronutrient for which there is no minimum intake requirement. In reality, in some places people eat a lot, but in other places people eat very little. What specific ranges of carbohydrate intake humans need to maintain in order to survive, be healthy, and even live longer are specific questions that need to be answered by scientific evidence.

;

;;The risks and costs of eating out;

;

;From an evolutionary perspective, larger brain capacity is consistent with the evolutionary process of humans, and larger brain capacity is consistent with the evolutionary process of humans. The brain needs more energy support. After humans entered agricultural civilization, typical lifestyle changes included growing and eating grains, which are foods rich in carbohydrates. For this reason, the human digestive system has become more adapted to starch, but accordingly, new eating habits have also brought about a series of new health problems.

;

;Latest research suggests that the mechanisms by which carbohydrates, glycemic index, and glycemic load may have negative health effects on weight may include enhanced responses to changes in insulin and other hormones that favor fat accumulation. . In recent years, some studies have shown that in addition to weight gain, the quality of carbohydrates may also increase a series of other health risks.

;

;In 2019, a systematic analysis study published in The Lancet showed that compared with those who ate the least dietary fiber, people who ate the most dietary fiber had better health outcomes. The risks of a range of diseases are 15% to 30% lower, including lower cardiovascular disease mortality, coronary heart disease incidence, stroke incidence and mortality, and lower risks of type 2 diabetes and colorectal cancer. In addition, clinical trial data also shows that eating more dietary fiber will lower blood pressure and total cholesterol. The lowest risk dietary fiber intake is 25 to 29 grams per day.

;

;Similarly, studies have found that whole grain intake may also help reduce overall disease risk. Increasing the intake of dietary fiber in the daily diet, replacing refined grains with whole grains, and eating more coarse grains will not only help with weight management, but also improve people's health.

;

;It is worth noting that with the epidemic of obesity in recent years, scientists have tried to verify a variety of weight loss and weight management strategies, most of which are related to "eating", including the total energy of meals and the amount of food consumed. time. In 2022, a one-year intermittent fasting trial carried out in China found that while restricting food energy, arranging eating times from 8 am to 4 pm every day and not eating at other times, such a The weight loss effect of this dietary pattern is no better than that of energy restriction alone, indicating the importance of controlling energy intake for weight loss.

;

;However, in April 2023, Australian researchers further narrowed the eating time window to 8 am to 12 noon every day, limiting the intake of 30% of the required energy to only these four hours. And you stick to this eating method for three non-consecutive days in a week, and you can eat whatever you want at other times. The experimental results found that under certain circumstances, intermittent fasting that limits meal times still has its own unique effect, not only can Lowering the weight of trial participants could also improve people's glucose tolerance and reduce their risk of type 2 diabetes.

;

;Leonie Heilbronn, a professor at the University of Adelaide School of Medicine and others who have long studied fasting and meal times, explained to Southern Weekend reporters that human metabolism is governed by biological rhythms The brain operates downwards, alternating between day and night 24 hours a day. Improper eating time will cause the brain's light and dark rhythms to be out of sync with the biological clocks in other organs and tissues. Moving meals earlier and avoiding eating at night will help the body coordinate these rhythms. combine.

;

;In 2022, a randomized controlled trial in the UK also supported the conclusion of eating early, but it was not because of differences in metabolism at different times, but because the study at that time found that if you eat more in the morning, your overall health will be reduced throughout the day. If the meal time is moved forward, people will not feel too hungry that day, and appetite and total energy intake will be controlled.

;

;;Weight management should be a long-term plan;

;

;For weight control, no matter what the strategy is or how difficult it is, whether it can be persisted in the long term is the key to weight management. key. Otherwise, no matter how radical and rapid the weight loss method is, it will rebound when you can't persist, and destroy people's confidence in weight management during the continuous rebound. Some people whose obesity problem is particularly serious and whose weight loss through conventional methods has been ineffective can only reduce their health risks through extremely limited methods such as bariatric surgery. However, this method requires the removal of part of the stomach, which is extremely invasive and does not work. Not suitable for most people who have less severe weight problems.

;

;From this perspective, the latest research controls weight by managing the source of carbohydrates, which does not involve harsh food intake restrictions or long fasting times, and has positive implications for people's long-term weight management. significance.

;

;Moreover, the researchers also found that the relationship between carbohydrate sources and weight management was more obvious in overweight or obese people than in people of normal weight, indicating that these people may be more susceptible to weight changes. Sensitive, more fragile, but in turn suggests that those who pay more attention to the sources of carbohydrates in their diet may benefit more from this type of weight management.

;

;Reflected in specific foods, it is necessary to limit sugary drinks and various types of steamed, fried, and baked refined rice noodles, and instead eat more roughly processed grains, fruits, and non-starchy foods. Vegetables etc. The "Mediterranean diet" widely praised by scientists is actually more scientific in managing carbohydrate sources and maintaining nutritional balance. In addition to consuming more vegetables, fruits, and whole grains, it also eats more beans and nuts, and more Fish and moderate amounts of poultry and dairy, but not a lot of red meat.

;Recently, a screenshot of a research report comparing BYD’s U8 and T-90 main battle tanks was exposed. This screenshot of the research report comes from the special research report on BYD released by the Western Securities R&D Center on October 24, 2023: "BYD (002594.SZ) first coverage report: Cost is the shield, technology is the spear, and the sword points at the global automotive leader" .

;

;On page 26 of the research report, in order to present the output power of BYD's Yi Sifang four-wheel motor, Western Securities compared the output power, engine, and body of BYD's U8 and T-90 main battle tanks. , amphibious, on-site U-turn, lateral travel, zero-hundred acceleration and the number of driving wheels, and concluded: "The technical indicators of Yi Sifang's four-wheel motor are comprehensively leading the industry." Looking up at the amphibious and lateral travel functions of U8, T -90 tanks are "none".

;

;According to Blue Whale Finance, a relevant person from Western Securities responded that the report was not written by an intern, and that the comparison of BYD’s U8 with main battle tanks was affected by relevant publicity.

;

;What is the impact of relevant publicity? Previously, many self-media compared BYD’s U8 with tanks. Regardless of whether the research report of Western Securities was influenced by self-media, but comparing electric vehicles with main battle tanks, and then claiming that its technical indicators are comprehensively leading the industry, whether the relevant arguments and conclusions are rigorous and reasonable will naturally be questioned by investors and public opinion. .

;

;In addition, in June this year, Western Securities and analysts were punished for research reports. According to the warning letter from the Shaanxi Supervision Bureau of the China Securities Regulatory Commission: After investigation, the internal control mechanism for the securities research report publishing business of Western Securities is not sound, individual surveys did not fulfill the pre-approval procedures, sales staff participated in the assessment of research report analysts, and compliance management did not cover expert consulting services. The main business links; the quality control and review of research reports are not strict, and some research reports have unreasonable valuation forecasts and imprudent conclusions.

;

;The relevant securities research report produced by Luo Yamein, the signed analyst of BYD’s research report, has problems such as imprudent research methods, lack of reasonable justification for some assumptions, and insufficient basis for some conclusions. Not only was it shown The warning letter is also recorded in the securities and futures market integrity files.

;

;Less than half a year later, Western Securities and the same analyst released another controversial research report.

;

;Of course, this was not done by a securities firm called Western Securities. In recent years, there have been numerous cases of securities companies being fined for "weird research reports". On December 30, 2021, the Jiangxi Securities Regulatory Bureau issued two law enforcement documents to punish Guosheng Securities and its researchers in the research report on the research report on "Tiangan and Earthly Branches in Time Selection". On October 18 of that year, Guosheng Securities's report called "Tiangan Divine Branch's Application of Time Selection" reported social attention. In the report, the time cycle of how the "Sky and Earthly Branches" dominate the market, and how to apply the "Sky Stem Branch" during the time selection. Liu Fubing, who has issued this research report for more than 12 years, has been on the list of 8 new wealth on the list, and 6 of them won the first place.

;

; If the above research report is "not amazingly dead", it has become a talk. There is also a type of "Strange Research Report" that is more likely to mislead investors.

;

; In July 2020, the Jiangsu Securities Regulatory Bureau posted a decision on administrative penalty, and the two analysts Ma Haobo, a signature of the two analysts signed by the "Fucheng Deep Report 2: 3: 3: 3: Three 10 billion supporting market value" Tang Weiliang fined a total of 200,000 yuan.

;

; In 2016, a research report released by Soochow Securities has boldly predicted that the "first share of A -share funeral" Focheng (600965.SH) is the absolute leader of the funeral industry in the future. And give Facheng "buy" rating.

;

; However, on October 25 of that year, Fucheng announced a "clarification announcement" to clarify the relevant content of the research report. Soochow Securities "Fucheng Research Report" stated that the number of tombs after the third phase of the Phase Three of the Pagoda Cemetery of Fucheng Co., Ltd. reached 400,000, and based on the data, Fusheng shares can get a net profit of 15.5 billion yuan. After investigation, the planning of the Pagoda Cemetery of Fucheng Co., Ltd. planned to build a tomb of about 125,000. The Forte Research Report also stated that the industrial M & A fund jointly established by Fucheng and a investment company has a total size of 10 billion yuan. The scale of the current period is 1 billion yuan, and the size of the subsequent fund is still 9 billion yuan. After investigation, as of October 2016, the size of the above -mentioned mergers and acquisitions funds was only 1 billion yuan. The situation of the subsequent funds also needed to make a decision based on the progress of the first phase of the fund and the quality of the acquisition of assets. Third, the "Fucheng Research Report" stated that the company's major shareholders of the company were 10 billion in cash and had sufficient funds as the inferior back end of the above -mentioned mergers and acquisitions funds. After investigation, as of October 2016, the major shareholders did not make decisions on this.

;

; The research report released by Soochow Securities is very different from the actual data of Focheng's shares. The source of the letter and whether the data is investigated and verified, I am afraid that they are all confused. How can we afford the credibility of the market?

;

; The so -called research report is an analysis report written by financial institutions such as securities companies, fund companies, banks, etc., which mainly include company analysis reports, industry analysis reports, investment strategy reports, etc. The purpose of the research report is to help investors better understand the market, the company, and the industry in order to be used as a reference. However, the content of the content is full of errors, pointing to Feng Shui, or a gimmick of the comparison of electric vehicles and the main battle tanks, reflecting that some brokers do not pay attention to the professionalism of the research report, and even use the research report as a kind of speculation tool.

;

; The motivation for the "Strange Research Report" of the securities firm cannot be simply attributed to the public. In the financial market, information publishing to some extent is a kind of power. Because of this, regulators have corresponding standard standards for financial institutions, listed companies, and media with various investment -oriented information. As a professional information provider, the research report of securities firms affects investors' decisions to a fairly extent. However, in the process of pursuing the so -called market influence, some brokers created some shocking remarks to attract attention and attention. There will be traffic or interest considerations, and may even disturb or distort the market trend. Since the securities firms are also one of the important positions of the stock market, if there is a brokerage company publishing a research report from a listed company or a certain section in an exaggerated way, it is not typical to buy or sell the corresponding stocks secretly in the country. Manipulating the stock market behavior?

;

; In this regard, the regulatory has also issued many relevant management new policies in recent years. In May last year, the regulatory authorities sent the "Notice on the" Double Random "on -site inspection of the" Double Random "inspection of securities research reporting business" to various securities firms. The report shows that in 2022, the special “double random” on -site inspection work was conducted in the industry's research reporting business, covering a total of 45 securities companies and 300 research newspapers. In September of that year, China Securities Association reiterated the self -discipline management of securities securities research business, including more than 1%of the shares holding the research bid to disclose and the research report must not be operated within two trading days; The "Qi Qi Research Report" continues.

;

; This shows that the punishment and regulatory efforts of the supervisory layers need to be strengthened for the strange research report. The warning letter, incorporated into the integrity file, etc., cannot touch the core interests of relevant personnel and securities firms, so that they would rather have a short -term market effect, and they are unwilling to adhere to the way of compliance. The regulatory authorities have made clear the responsibility of the production report and publishing of securities firms, and continue to increase the punishment of illegal acts. Fang may be able to stop the vicious cycle of the brokerage research newspaper's "bad currency elimination of good coins".

One year later, Mr. Chen's research team submitted 350,000 words of "Draft of the Criminal Procedure Law of the People's Republic of China" to the Law and Industry Commission, of which 65%of the provisions were absorbed.

;

; In addition to domestic project projects, I assisted Mr. Chen for some international exchanges and cooperation to carry out some comparative research. For example, students are sent to study abroad, translated and published some criminal proceedings of representative countries, and promoted the implementation of the international human rights conventions and the implementation of the United Nations criminal justice standards in China, and so on. It should be said that it has done a lot of beneficial things to promote the development of my country's criminal proceedings system, and has also promoted the discipline construction and talent training of the litigation law of China University of Political Science and Law. These University of Political Science and Law were unique at that time. For other schools, there were neither the strength of this team, but also the necessary conditions and abilities.

;

; ; Southern Weekend: ; ; Modify the Constitution in 2004 At that time, Professor Chen proposed to write "national respect and protection of human rights" into the constitution; in 2012, when the second prosecution law was repaired for the second time, this one was written into the criminal lawsuit law. As his student, you have always advocated that the criminal lawsuit should protect personal rights. Why do you have always paid attention to this issue? ;

;

; ; 卞 卞: ; ; The relationship between human rights protection and criminal litigation is very close. The criminal lawsuit is a typical field of public power, and it is the heavy weapon for national governance. For a long time, due to the influence of ideas, institutions, and even ideology, we regard criminal lawsuits as a contest between the country and the crime, emphasizing the punishment of crimes, which leads to the power of the national special agencies in the lawsuit. Correspondingly, the rights and interests of criminal suspects, defendants, and other participants will not be fully protected. From the perspective of social development, the country's comprehensively promoting the governance of the country according to law and building a rule of law in accordance with the country must pass the rule of law and regulate public power through procedures, so as not to let power alienation and abuse. Through their own efforts, we strengthen human rights protection in justice, affect legislation, and improve judicial. Under the leadership of Mr. Chen, we also made our own efforts and contributions for this. ;

;

; ; "The law of apprentices is not enough" ;

;

; ; Southern Weekend: ; ; In the previous school lecture, you discussed the case of unjust and false cases. Judicial progress, from the perspective of past news reports, the agent lawyers of many cases are called "dead lawyers". What do you think of this group? ;

;

;;卞建林：;;辩护制度和律师职业体现了一个国家的法治水平。 If the level of lawyers in a country is weak and the defense system is not sound, the progress of criminal prosecution is impossible. 1979年制定刑诉法时，基本上没有律师，1980年才有律师暂行条例，因此立法关于律师辩护的规定是比较落后的。但是从1996年开始几次刑诉法修订都对律师辩护制度作出完善，总体而言辩护制度的进步是有目共睹的。 ;

;

;但同时也应看到，关于律师辩护的法律规定，特别是司法实践中律师辩护还是存在不少问题。我觉得其中一个重要原因就是没找到对律师职业和律师辩护的准确定位。在刑事诉讼中，辩护律师的职责是为被告人辩护，从事实、证据、法律适用、程序运作等各个角度挑毛病，发现问题，以促进案件的公正处理，从而提升法治水平。在性质上，律师不是行使公权力，不是办案机关的成员。而我们对律师的管理方式不一样，律师由司法行政机关管理，而司法行政机关又属于国家专门机关的组成部分。

;

;在司法实践中，律师为了提供有效辩护，为了维护当事人合法权益，或者为了使法定程序得到遵守，需要在履行辩护职责时较真，有时会和办案机关办案人员产生冲突，因此有些律师被称作“死磕派律师”。但他们如果不较真，不死磕，就维护不了当事人利益，也不能正常进行辩护工作。最近又发生了一些极端的例子，如广西来宾一法院，强制律师进行安检，百般刁难，侵犯律师的正当权益，产生很坏的影响，受到全国人民的关注，也受到最高法院的点名。我想这样极端的事情发生后，整个法院系统都应引以为戒。

;

;;南方周末：;;似乎这种矛盾在我们的很多法律制度中都会存在。 ;

;

;;卞建林：;;徒法不足以自行。纸面上的法要成为行动中的法，确实需要时间，在执行过程中也会出现各种问题。一定意义上说，我国目前司法实践中出现的一些问题，或者面临的困境，很多也是制度发展以后带来的。有些本来看起来很好的事情，但真正做起来却很难。可能会触动一些人的利益，甚至会激化矛盾。我认为发展中的问题还是要靠发展来解决，一方面在制度设计时要更多地了解情况，关注实践；另一方面法律一旦被修改，就必须维护法律的权威，办案机关要严格执法，带头守法，切实遵守法律规定的程序。 ;

;

; ; Southern Weekend: ; ;>; ">;以前大家都说法学是人文社科，现在又说法学是人文社科里的工科，你怎么看这种观点？ ;

;

;;卞建林：;;毫无疑问，法学是人文社会科学，至少是门学问，或者说是科学，同时它也确实具有工科的一些属性，尤其是我们这个学科，应用性、操作性都很强。我们过去学习时，学的是“刑事诉讼法”，现在叫“刑事诉讼法学”，多了一个“学”字，其实是意识到这是个科学，是个知识体系。不仅仅是对法律作出表义的解释，而且用它来治理社会，达到良好的效果。以对案件事实的查明为例，不单单是认识论上的问题，还涉及价值论、方法论，要以正当程序来规制办案机关的权力行使。程序法总体而言是个操作规范，要有一套具体的原则规则、方法程序和制度规范，而且要细致缜密，具有可操作性，使诉讼活动有法可依。 ;

;

; ; Southern Weekend: ; ;>; ">;从四十多年的求学、学术经历走过来，你有什么经验能向年轻学子们分享吗？ ;

;

;;卞建林：;;无论是做学问还是做老师，其实我都是跟陈先生学的，他为我们树立了榜样，教导我们要有爱国忧民之心，要有开放的视野，钻研的精神，这也是我做学问时努力遵循的。除此之外，我也经常提醒学生，要关心时事，关注当下。很多事情每天就发生在我们身边，或者每天都有与我们专业密切相关的事例，不要充耳不闻，漠不关心。 ;

;

;至于怎么做学问、怎么写文章，这确实不是一个容易的事情。我觉得首先个人要努力，同时也需要机遇。像我们当年读书时，应该说机会还多一点，在我们前面由于断代而缺人，而社会又急需人才，这样才会有什么这个第一个，那个第一个。现在法学变成了显学，年轻人压力很大，但机会却不是很多，那就需要更加勤奋，倍加努力，要沉得下心，耐得住寂寞，莫辜负青春年华，真学有所成，会有用武之时和适当回报的。

; Sun, 19 Nov 2023 11:25:04 +0800 《等待戈多》作者最喜欢的戏剧来中国，观众看得很精神http://www.infzm.com/contents/260887
;;2023-11-19 10:00:00;
;

;A black box stood on the stage. "Endgame" had not officially started, but the two characters were already inside. Extremely similar clips are repeated over and over again, as if the stage has turned into a machine that plays on a loop due to malfunction. The servant Clover wrung his fingers and walked the same route repeatedly with a strange gait. He stepped back from the door to the right of Master Ham's wheelchair, walked to the corner on the left, and then to the door on the right, taking fourteen precise steps, every time.

;

;The dialogue has not changed either. "Do you want me to leave you?" "Of course." "Then I will leave you." "You can't leave me." "Then I won't leave you." The door was opened and closed again and again.

;

;In 1953, "Waiting for Godot" brought Beckett worldwide fame, but his favorite work was "Endgame" written four years later.

;

;;

;

;Beckett's play "Endgame" will be performed at the 10th Wuzhen International Theater Festival in 2023. ;(Photo courtesy of the organizer);

;

;This play shows four deformed people in an empty house that is approaching the end of the world. : The master Ham is paralyzed from the lower body, blind, and has been sitting in a wheelchair; the servant Clover has a disease in his knees and cannot sit down. Ham's parents, Nag and Nell, have lost their lower limbs and live in two trash cans. The relationships between masters and servants, husbands and wives, and parents and children all show an extremely cruel side, but they are interdependent and inseparable.

;

;In the impression of Tobias Bianconi, Director General of the International Theater Association, in the past, the audience's reaction to Beckett and even absurdist plays was sometimes "very frustrating and unhappy", but After he walked out of the theater, he found that after watching this version of the Vienna Volkstheater's performance, the Chinese audience was full of energy and had lively discussions. They all felt that the play was very fresh. "Why is there such a reaction? What is the background that makes the audience like this play so much?" he was curious.

;

;In the 20th century, which experienced the ravages of two world wars and was immersed in industrialization and the post-industrial era, the rationalism admired by Western civilization fell into crisis, belief in God collapsed, and self-doubt and self-denial became the themes of the times. This also brought profound conceptual changes to drama. What Beckett's drama expresses is the antagonistic relationship between human beings and nature, society, self and others who are completely alienated in social crisis.

;

;Absurd drama, which was born in Paris, France, in the early 1950s, was echoed again in Wuzhen, China, seventy years later. "At the beginning, we thought the most exciting thing was this very unhealthy and toxic relationship. Later we discovered that it had some parts related to war. As it slowly developed, we found that it might be related to climate change. Recently, We found that it was combined with the COVID-19 epidemic." During the dialogue, theater director and German director Kai Vogels said that this version of "Endgame" has been performed for eleven years. "The point of it being constantly performed is that it is always new. , what we see from this drama keeps changing."

;

;;

;

;Beckett's play "Endgame" was written in the late 1950s. The version that came to China has already been sold in Europe Acted for eleven years. ;(Photo courtesy of the organizer);

;

;Vogels refined the four characters into two clown-like people, retaining the main theme A very tense contrast between servants: Ham is physically disabled, but has the power to control Clover; Clough is relatively able to move freely, but is always dominated by his master to do unnecessary trivial things, and his spirit tends to be paralyzed. .

;

;The most eye-catching adaptation is Vogels’ emphasis on the sense of looping. The line, which was on an infinite loop before the show even started, only appeared once in the original script. Vogels uses this as the opening or closing line of every dialogue, repeating it a dozen times throughout the play.

;

;A new plot in the play brings an "anti-climax": after Clover struggled, he shot Hamm, but the expected relief brought by death did not happen. After the monologue, Ham suddenly answered and got up from the ground, as if nothing had happened. Clover and he returned to their usual endless conversation.

;

;"Beckett actually demonstrated a ritual cycle on the stage. The ending of this ritual cycle is satisfaction, nothingness, or the end of the world. Everyone can see it differently. Each point has its own interpretation, and what I present on the stage also has this meaning." At the beginning of the rehearsal, Voges hoped to show the inextricable cycle of repetition on the stage without making the audience feel bored. This balance Feeling is what he is looking for.

;

;Since 1998 Vogels has been a theater and opera director in Austria and Germany. German drama is relatively lagging behind in digital innovation. From 2010 to 2020, while serving as the artistic director of the Dortmund Theater in Germany, Vogels began to try to combine digital media with drama and introduce digital thinking to the drama stage. He is a pioneer.

;

;Among these works, digital techniques such as VR, real-time images, and on-site editing are emerging in endlessly. "Endgame" pursues Beckett's minimalist style. However, the artificially isolated cramped space, heavy metal-style amplified sound effects, The sudden switching of dazzling lights, the characters' mechanically looping movements and lines, all give this picture of the human spiritual wasteland a cold science fiction color.

;

;The more traditional images such as "desert" and "dead branches" in Beckett's original work are missing. In terms of stage design, the play chose a form that abstracted away from reality. Like the door, the few sets and props are all outlined with white chalk lines. Three-dimensional life seems to be locked in two-dimensional space. Machine guns and toy dogs are just thin wooden boards hanging on the wall when they are not picked out by actors and held in their hands. The clock has no hands and the flowers in the vase are out of proportion. The only real objects are the wooden chair with armrests in the center of the stage and the light bulb hanging in the air.

;

;The actors' performances are consistent with German precision, and they achieve the ultimate in repetitive movements with slight changes. The actor who played Ham sat in a chair with his eyes closed throughout the performance, but still showed a strong sense of dominance and oppression in the relationship through his tone and gestures.

;

;The voice can be called the third "starring" of this drama, expanding the information and emotional density in the minimalist world. Clough's footsteps continued to echo in the space, powerful, but as flat as the scenery, with no specific sense of direction. Footsteps create a strong conflict with directionlessness. Every time Clover dropped something he was holding, there was a loud cracking sound, whether it was a telescope, a machine gun, or a toy dog. The laws of the physical world break down here.

;

;The two people, who are both master and servant and father and son, are imprisoned in a lifeless atmosphere. The room they were in was, in a sense, like the final game board in a chess match. Ham is the general on the chessboard and needs to ensure that he is in the "center" of the room, controlling his pieces. The little soldier Clover could barely move a few steps, but under the command of blind Ham, the situation was certain to lose, but they could not and did not dare to leave the room, just like the chess pieces could not leave the chessboard. "There is no nature anymore" outside the house. Even when I opened the window, I saw "ZERO" written on the blackboard.

;

;They passed the time by teasing, controlling, and torturing each other, telling the old stories again, and looking at the window that they had looked at countless times, hoping that something would happen. What happened in front of my eyes was that other people passed by the window. However, their expectations were all in vain, and all their actions no longer made much sense.

;

;At the end of the play, I realized that the beginning was the end. "What time is it?" "Same as usual." They repeated the dialogue at the opening. Everything stopped suddenly, leaving silence and darkness.
